document.full_text: the league responded to players' attempt to gain an injunction to lift the lockout, including asking that the judge wait for a decision from the national labor relations board.
document.title: n.f.l. asks court to wait for labor board's ruling
lines_and_colors: the league responded to players' attempt to gain an injunction to lift the lockout, including asking that the judge wait for a decision from the national labor relations board.
